Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

::As the harpoon neared hellpeon the bot snarled. He slowly moved over to the 
right melting away more of the floors and walls around him and making the 
harpoon fly right past he chaochitan energy orb around him. In response 
Hellpeon channel more chaochitan energy making the orb increae in size 
greatly which melted the harpoon the defense and the orb. Soon afterwards the 
orb reached its full size now engulfing a large portion of the hallway he was 
in, the one above, the one below, and on either side of him. However energy 
continued to be channeled and the orb glowed brighter, and brighter still as 
an ear piercing hum sound began. The trainers base computer would have 
detected this massive energy surge most likely. At the orb itself a large 
shockwave is released that began to tear through the armored walls of the 
ship and ones that arent heavily armored.

--part1_124.910c8b.286219f6_boundary
